item.description:
Please Update your RSVP if your plans have changed.

Kevin Krueger of Suphafans will be leading the crawl.

Please call him if you have any questions 617-838-3337.

Calling any and all available Assistant Organizers to rsvp and help with this meetup.

Up to 75 people are expected on the crawl.

Join Kevin Krueger and all of his SuphaFans and The Red Sox Natives for the Annual Supha Fan's Fenway Pub Crawl around Fenway Park and Kenmore Square during Futures at Fenway Day on Saturday, August 20.

The fun begins at 12pm at The SuphaFans Store at 470 Commonwealth Avenue.

"Fenway Drinking Team" Shirts are available for only $10 at the SuphaFans Store

Drinking Team members should get a little special treatment from the bars.

Team up with your fellow drinking buddies to upgrade to the bargain 6-Pack shirts for $60.00

Join the crawl at the The SuphaFans Store or at your favorite venue...whenever you can. If you don't find the group at the scheduled bar, check the previous or later bar. Still having trouble finding them? Text or call Kevin's cell at 617-838-3337 for the group's location.

The fun ends at the BaseBall Tavern hours later or whenever.....whichever comes first!

 

Crawl Venues are as follows:

Batting Practice (Noon):  The SuphaFans Store 470 Commonwealth Ave 02215 (866) 787-2432

1st Inning (Noonish):  The Lower Depths 476 Commonwealth Ave 02215 (617) 266-6662

2nd Inning (1 pm):      Cask'n Flagon 62 Brookline Avenue 02215-3402 (617) 536-4840

3rd Inning (2 pm):      Who's On First? 9 Yawkey Way 02215 (617) 247-3353

4th Inning (3 pm):      Boston Beerworks  61 Brookline Avenue 02215 ( 617) 536-2337

5th Inning (4 pm):      Game On! 82 Landsdowne Street 022151 (617) 351-7001

6th Inning (5 pm):       The Bleacher Bar 82A Landsdowne Street 02215 (617) 262-2424

7th Inning (6 pm):       The House of Blues 15 Lansdowne Street 02215 (617) 960-8375

8th Inning (7 pm):       Lansdowne Pub 9 Landsdowne Street 02215  (617) 247-1222

9th Inning (8 pm):       Jerry Remy's  1265 Boylston Street 02215-3410   (617) 236-7369

Extra Innings (9 pm):   The Baseball Tavern 1270 Boylston Street 02215  ( 617) 867-6526        

Join the crawl early at the SuphaFan's store, at your favorite venue or whenever.

Invite other Drinking Buddies, friends, co-workers, family...All are welcome.

Please remember to maintain your own bar and food tabs as well as tip your servers.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at SuphaFan's Store at 12pm or Join at The Posted Crawl Venues
item.why:
3rd Annual Fenway Pub Crawl - each year, the same Saturday as The Red Sox' Futures at Fenway Minor League games.
Baseball plays 9 Innings so we Play at 9 Bars - changing once an hour.
Come join other SupahFans for a day-and-night of SupahFun!
item.name: 3rd Annual SuphaFan's Pub Crawl Around Fenway Park and Kenmore Square
